dct_title_s: Map of property of Valvoline Oil Company and W. Dixon Ellis, Borough of Edgewater, Bergen Co., N.J.
dct_description_sm: Map featuring the riparian lines of two properties: the Valvoline Oil Company and W. Dixon Ellis, in addition to the adjacent lots of John Winterburn and Nicholas Olsen.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Bearings or courses refer to True North, not Magnetic North.
